name: 語言學概論（二）
comment: 建議修習輔系第一年時選修
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENU0259  語言學概論（一）】、【ENU0331  語言學概論（一）】其中一門 ◎課程開放上修
goals: to familiarize the students enrolled with the fundamental concepts and the basic skills required for doing linguistic analysis
the students will be better equipped both for more advanced linguistics courses and as a competent English teacher.
syllabus:
**I. Goal:**

This is a two-semester course designed to (1) introduce students to important theoretical concepts and empirical findings of modern linguistics and (2) acquaint them with proper approaches to language study. Major topics covered in this course include: phonology, morphology, syntax, semantics, language change, and the interrelationships between linguistics and other disciplines. There is emphasis on linguistic data drawn from English, Chinese and a number of other languages to serve as instances in illustration of cross-linguistic differences. Besides, exercises are provided for students to complete to enhance their efficacy.

**II. Course Requirements:**

1.  Attendance is required for this class. Absence without a proper reason may result in failing this course.
2.  This course has several quizzes, mid-term and final exams.
